## grimoire generate

Get generation from Ollama.

### Synopsis

Requests generation from Ollama while optionally prepending a prompt

```
grimoire generate [flags] [input...]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for generate
  -p, --prompt string   Prompt file to prepend to input
```
